# mssql_database (Resource)

MssqlDatabase resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Database name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Database ID. Can be retrieved using `SELECT DB_ID('<db_name>')`.
